nodes.text: The Sith beastmaster Adrazar attempted to train packs of scyks—reptiles from the planet Tatooine—sometime before the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. However, the creatures turned on each other and killed each other in a frenzy. The only scyk that survived was then trained by Adrazar to guard his domicile on the planet Dromund Kaas.
Adrazar's scyk was first mentioned in the Codex entry for scyks in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare in 2011.
